meanings.sent1: The new jacket she bought was ultrahip and caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The ultrahip cafe in town always has the latest decor and music.
meanings.sent3: His ultrahip dance moves made everyone smile at the party.
meanings.sent4: The ultrahip fashion show was a feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The ultrahip hairstyle she had was the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is very cool or stylish
meanings.sent1: She was considered the ultrahip of the group with her unique sense of style.
meanings.sent2: The ultrahip of the school always knew the latest trends before anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The ultrahip of the office always had the best jokes to share.
meanings.sent4: He was the ultrahip of the music scene, always discovering new artists.
meanings.sent5: The ultrahip of the neighborhood had the coolest car on the block.
